contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 23, 1997 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-championship-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium - Parc and Dare. Best trombone - Tredegar. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
April 7, 2015, 11:57 a.m. July 2, 2020, 3:03 p.m.
1 Cory Band Jeremy Wise
2 BTM Band Alan Morrison
3 Tredegar Town Band Jim Davies
4 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Stan Lippeatt
5 Parc and Dare Band Richard Adams
6 Lewis Merthyr Band Unknown
7 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
Withdrawn Tongwynlais Temperance Band Bernard Williams
